snippet: The Brooklyn district attorney’s office is looking into management practices at Wyckoff Heights Medical Center, focusing on the relationship between hospital officials and a Caribbean medical school.
abstract: Brooklyn district attorney’s office is looking into management practices at Wyckoff Heights Medical Center, focusing on the relationship between hospital officials and a Caribbean medical school in which the officials had a financial stake.
lead_paragraph: The Brooklyn district attorney’s office is looking into management practices at Wyckoff Heights Medical Center, focusing on the relationship between hospital officials and a Caribbean medical school.

headline.seo: Brooklyn Prosecutor Investigating Wyckoff Heights Hospital’s Management
